allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Stash GraphQL Tagger v1.8

Complete PyQt6 desktop application for managing Stash media library.

Features:
- Search and filter scenes (title, performer, studio, date, duration, file size, resolution)
- Bulk operations (tag assignment, scene renaming, performer/studio assignment)
- Tab-based UI with Search and Settings tabs
- 3-column resizable layout with customizable section placement
- Color customization (sections, fonts, buttons) with live preview
- Async operations with progress tracking
- Dry-run mode for safe testing
- CSV export/import functionality
- Persistent configuration

Architecture:
- PyQt6 GUI with MainWindow class
- Async workers using Qt QRunnable for non-blocking operations
- GraphQL client for Stash API communication
- Scene table model with 12 customizable columns
- Signal/slot pattern for thread-safe communication

Completed Phases:
- Phase 0.1-0.6: UI foundation and customization
- Phase 1.7: Resolution filtering
- Phase 1.8: Scene renaming
EOF
)")
